title: go build etc: should work in $GOROOT/src/cmd
body:
This should work IMHO:

% cd $GOROOT/src/cmd/godoc
% go build .
path "/home/rog/go/src/cmd/godoc" not inside a GOPATH
path "/home/rog/go/src/cmd/godoc" not inside a GOPATH
%

Either the Go source tree should be changed to
follow the standard form (my preference)
or $GOROOT/src/cmd should be special-cased.

d5d8367a4775+ tip
